Package net.sf.opensftp

Interface Summary
ProgressListener ProgressListeners monitor progresses of put/get operations to provide progress meter functionality.
Prompter Prompter is used to retrieve the user's choice when he must make one.
SftpFile An SftpFile object represents a file or directory.
SftpFileAttribute An SftpFileAttribute object represents the attribute of a file or directory represented by an SftpFile object.
SftpResult An SftpResult object represents an SFTP operation result covering the following points of interest:
SftpSession An SftpSession object represents the context information of a communication between a client and an SFTP server.
SftpUtil SftpUtil provides a handy set of utilities designed to ease your work with SFTP.
 

Class Summary
AbstractProgressListener An easy approach to work with ProgressListener.
SftpUtilFactory Factory that implements the following algorithm to dynamically select a SftpUtil implementation class to instantiate a Singleton object for.
 

Exception Summary
SftpException An exception that provides information on an SFTP access error.
